title: Meminisse
description: Kurusu Rai's family died when he was young, but he has no clear memories of what happened. One day, a girl named Sai shows up at his school to tell him that someone is after his life. She claims that she has super powers and that the person after him does as well. It turns out that Rai also harbors impressive destructive power, but what is it in his past that he does not remember?
author: Shiozuka Makoto
